mapper.sql: u_id , p_id , menu , price , request , fee , remit
mapper.select: select * from post where post.r_id in (select r_id from restaurant where category=#{category});
select post.p_id, title, r_name, order_time, category, min_price, post_fee from post, restaurant where post.done=0 and post.r_id=restaurant.r_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (title, order_time, post_time, shooting_user, p_location, u_id, r_id, done) VALUES (#{title}, #{order_time}, #{post_time}, #{shooting_user}, #{p_location}, #{u_id}, #{r_id}, true)
mapper.select: select * from (select title, r_name, order_time, category, min_price from post left join restaurant on post.r_id=restaurant.r_id)A where title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or r_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%');

select * from (select user.u_id, post.p_id, title, name, category, r_name, order_time, min_price from post left join user on post.u_id=user.u_id join restaurant on post.r_id=restaurant.r_id order by p_id)A where p_id=#{p_id};
mapper.update: update post set done=1 where p_id=#{p_id};
